name: Earth Defender (Maen2i, everplay)
description:
Game Jam game made in 60h(almost) for Video Game Lab Game Jam, created by At0mium, on the theme Arcade.

You play as a ship who need to defend the earth against an invasion.

How long will you survive?

Don’t hesitate to share your score in the comments below! :D

Music made by Eric Skif : https://youtu.be/hrgzWEgCCFg

Sounds : https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/360928/
